query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_goals (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  goal_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  target_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
  current_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
  unit VARCHAR(50),
  start_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  target_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'active',
  completed_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  reminder_frequency VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'weekly',
  last_reminder_sent TIMESTAMP NULL,
  next_reminder_due TIMESTAMP NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX idx_user_goals_user_id (user_id),
  INDEX idx_user_goals_status (status),
  INDEX idx_user_goals_next_reminder (next_reminder_due)
)
command:

  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,

  status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'active',
  completed_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  reminder_frequency VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'weekly',
  last_reminder_sent TIMESTAMP NULL,
  next_reminder_due TIMESTAMP NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX idx_user_goals_user_id (user_id),
  INDEX idx_user_goals_status (status),
  INDEX idx_user_goals_next_reminder (next_reminder_due)
)
